title: Perry's Victory & International Peace Memorial: Professional Development
body: Professional Development        Suggested Reading If you every wanted to find a list of books about the War of 1812 or the Battle of Lake Erie you will find it here All Suggested Reading     Teacher Workshops Currently Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial does not have any teacher workshops, however; if you are a teacher and need to find War of 1812, Battle of Lake Erie, or natural history resouces you will find many right here. All Teacher Workshops
